name: BYOBattleship
description:
BYOBattleship is a build-your-own-warship arcade naval combat simulator. Design destroyers, cruisers, and battleships in a singleplayer campaign. Take on dozens of enemy ships and strange superweapons singlehanded.

NOTE: thus far, the game is controller-only. Missions will fail to load (permanent black screen) if you have not plugged in and used a controller to navigate the UI. Keyboard/mouse support is planned!

Trailer (several months out of date): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xt--T1s6704

Some clips of gameplay:

https://i.imgur.com/OXszXtL.mp4

https://i.imgur.com/92qvs2e.mp4

https://i.imgur.com/1Nmyygc.mp4

The game is still in active development. Currently it contains three full missions, but no tutorial. During combat hit START to pause the game and access a brief controls overview.

I am unable to test the Linux/OSX builds. Please let me know if they do not work!
